contributors.title: Funding information
contributors.description: Please list all funding sources for this project.

funder.title: Funding Information - Funder name
funder.description: Please state the full name of the funder you received funding from for the data you want to share (no abbreviations).

grantID.description: Please state the grant ID for the funding you have received.
